law.catch_line: Exclusivity of KRS 304.49-010 to 304.49-230 to captive insurance companies -- Provisions applicable to industrial insured captive insurer.

text.section: No provisions of this chapter, other than those contained in KRS 304.49-010 to 304.49-230 or contained in specific references contained in KRS 304.49-010 to 304.49-230, shall apply to captive insurance companies.

law.history: Amended 2012 Ky. Acts ch. 74, sec. 19, effective July 12, 2012. -- Created 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 434, sec. 15, effective July 14, 2000.
